title: Gauge-invariant magnetic charges in linearised gravity
abstract: arXiv:2405.08876v2 Announce Type: replace  Abstract: Linearised gravity has magnetic charges carried by (linearised) Kaluza-Klein monopoles. A gauge-invariant expression is found for these charges that is similar to Penrose's gauge-invariant expression for the ADM charges. A systematic search is made for other gauge-invariant charges.
